<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Shared Stratagem](/Feats.aspx?ID=1454) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Investigator" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=318" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 61 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

The plans you make include your allies as well as yourself. When you hit a creature with an attack on which you substituted your attack roll due to [Devising a Stratagem](/Actions.aspx?ID=546), designate one ally. The creature you hit is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) to that ally on the next attack the designated ally makes against that creature before the start of your next turn.

<title level="2">Shared Stratagem leads to...</title>
[Didactic Strike](/Feats.aspx?ID=1476)
name: Shared Stratagem
